temperature diffusion equation: (dif(b, t) * nt + u * dif(b, x) * nx - w * dif(b, z) * nz) * 1
salinity diffusion equation: (dif(s, t) * nt + u * dif(s, x) * nx - w * dif(s, z) * nz) * 1
momentum equation z: (dif(w, t) * nt + u * dif(w, x) * nx - w * dif(w, z) * nz - 1 / rho * dif(p, z) * nz + 9.8) / 1
momentum equation x: (dif(u, t) * nt + u * dif(u, x) * nx - w * dif(u, z) * nz + 1 / rho * dif(p, x) * nx) * 1
